response.original_title: Rollercoaster - The Story of Bay City Roller Stuart Woody Wood
response.overview: The Remarkable Life Story of Bay City Roller Suart 'Woody' Wood. From his childhood in Edinburgh to the the rise of Rollermania and one of the biggest selling bands of all time for whom he wrote a large percentage of their songs along with bandmate Eric Faulkner to the lows of where did all the royalties disappear to and the rise again of his career with traditional Scottish music and the resurgence of The Rollers.
response.title: Rollercoaster - The Story of Bay City Roller Stuart Woody Wood
